feed.title: Lake Superior (Provincial Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Lake Superior (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:57 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -11.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Superior Provincial Park 12:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Temperature: -11.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -13.2°C
Wind: SE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow beginning early this evening. Local amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy. High minus 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
